Html: When switching between these buffs, I noticed that my dps doesn't change at all.  I also would think that the relative stat value of Spirit would go up or down, but it doesn't.  Is this a bug or am I missing something?  Both armors are glyphed and I have all pertinent raid buffs selected.
"Automatic Armor" in the options tab makes it ignore which one/none you have marked on the Buffs tab, and use whichever is best. Mouseover the chosen Cycles on the Stats tab to see which it chose.
Oooh gotcha.  Is that option set by default?  I don't remember setting it initially but I very well may have and just forgot.  Anyways thanks!
Yeah, that's the default, since that's what you normally want.
